results.title: Simvastatin alleviates airway inflammation and remodelling through up-regulation of autophagy in mouse models of asthma.
results.text_hl: Thus, we investigated the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@airway inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Airway_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056151 @@@airway remodelling@@@ and the possible relationship of these processes to a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced autophagic pathway in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@.
